required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of the 3-month Strut Coverage After Coronary Stenting by Optical Coherence Tomography; Cilotax and DESyne

brief_summary.textblock: We will compare the stent coverage at 3 months by optical coherence tomography (OCT) between the Cilotax and DESyne drug-eluting stents (DES). The extent of the strut uncoverage has not been evaluated yet for both the Cilotax and DESyne and we first sought to decide the reference intervals using 40 samples (total 44 patients for each group considering 10% drop-out rate) as the pilot study.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 3 months after stent implantation
primary_outcome.description: The percentage of stent uncoverage measured by OCT

clinical_study.condition: Patients in the Treatment of Subjects With All-comer Who Are to Undergo PCI

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients â‰¥ 20 years old
- Patients in the treatment of subjects with all-comer who are to undergo PCI
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women or women with potential childbearing
- Life expectancy < 1 year

facility.name: Division of Cardiology, Yonsei Cardiovascular Hospital, Yonsei University College of Medicine

clinical_study.keyword: Optical coherence tomography, Drug-eluting stent, Strut coverage
